tasks.label: Prisma: Dev Migration (local)
tasks.command: npx dotenv -e .env.local -- npx prisma migrate dev

tasks.label: Prisma: Deploy Migration (production)
tasks.command: npx dotenv -e .env.production -- npx prisma migrate deploy

tasks.label: Prisma: Reset (local)
tasks.command: npx dotenv -e .env.local -- npx prisma migrate reset --force

tasks.label: Prisma: Reset (production)
tasks.command: npx dotenv -e .env.production -- npx prisma migrate reset --force
